sentence: By Jason Lange WASHINGTON (Reuters) - A bipartisan majority of U.S. voters oppose politicians punishing companies over their stances on social issues, a cold reception for campaigns like Florida Governor Ron DeSantis' against Walt Disney Co, a Reuters/Ipsos poll found.
author: Jason Lange
title: Americans do not support politicians punishing firms for their views -Reuters/Ipsos
